snippet: STRAUS--James D.,68 years old, longtime resident of Chicago, died at home on December 26. Jim grew up in Manhasset, NY, with his loving parents Alexander and Mary Ellen. He is survived by his sister Patti (Bob Fountaine), brother John (Diane), his niece Alexis (Jake Gettier) and his nephews John Jr. (Daisy) and Jesse. At the request of his family, donations in his memory can be made to Lincoln Park Community Shelter, 600 West Fullerton Parkway, Chicago, Il 60614. (www.lpcsonline.org). 1/3
